author: cms-tsg-storm
body:
#### PR description:

Development of HLT menus for `CMSSW_15_0_X` (branch `CMSSW_16_0_X`):
   * This is the PR for the master branch, which will then be backported down to `15_0_X` (the latter is the release cycle currently used for Run-3 HLT-menu development).
   * These updates correspond to further changes accumulated after the "V1.3" (last) GRun menu was delivered. 
   * **This is the close-out development PR in the `CMSSW_15_0_X` cycle**
 
This update includes the integration of the following JIRA tickets:
   - [CMSHLT-3629](https://its.cern.ch/jira/browse/CMSHLT-3629) [BPH] Low-PU 2025 BPH DiMuon path with pT=0 and OS+SS muons
   - [CMSHLT-3640](https://its.cern.ch/jira/browse/CMSHLT-3640) [HIN] Silence framework related warnings in HIon menu

In addition this PR introduces the following commits:
   * c71ce2d383ba529cd58b62485c3e242aa11bad50: Migration to new template `CMSSW_15_0_15`, including frozen menus and disabling customisation for #48957
   * fcf05cc1d43706e630ced99d87e93157a132e452: percolate `DQMGPUvsCPU` event content to `HLTDebugRAW` and `HLTDebugFEVT` for release validation purposes

#### PR validation:

TSG Integration tests.

#### If this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR. If this PR will be backported please specify to which release cycle the backport is meant for:

Not a backport, it will be backported to `CMSSW_15_0_X` (current data-taking release for 2025)
title: HLT menu development for `15_0_X` (11/N)  [`16_0_X`]
